title: In Allentown's Syrian community, a divide over Trump's travel ban
text: "The so-called Muslim ban is ridiculously stupid. It makes us look like we're at war with Islam, and that will only be used as a recruitment tool," said Assaf, an activist who has tried to pressure the American government to get more involved in ending the war in Syria. "It makes us less secure, not more, and it's counterproductive in every way. This will affect business deals, employment and trade. Everything about it is stupid."
summary:
"The so-called Muslim ban is ridiculously stupid.
It makes us look like we're at war with Islam, and that will only be used as a recruitment tool," said Assaf, an activist who has tried to pressure the American government to get more involved in ending the war in Syria.
"It makes us less secure, not more, and it's counterproductive in every way.
This will affect business deals, employment and trade.
Everything about it is stupid."
